name: I will make eye contact when I introduce myself
I will be kind if someone talks on the side when I speak
I will smile when others are speaking to show interest
I will ask questions to get to know others more
I will be a good listener
I will continue to speak politely even if someone interrupts me
I will share my qualities and interests to make friends

I will appreciate the qualities and actions of others
